verses.roman:
hṛdaye preraṇa kara, jihvāya kahāo vāṇī
ki kahiye bhāla-manda, kichui nā jāni

synonyms: hṛdaye—within the heart; preraṇa—direction; kara—You give; jihvāya—on the tongue; kahāo—You make me speak; vāṇī—words; ki—what; kahiye—I am speaking; bhāla-manda—good or bad; kichui—something; nā—not; jāni—I know.
translation: "You inspire me within the heart and make me speak with the tongue. I do not know whether I am speaking well or badly."
